EmailTemplate.name: CS - Application More Info Needed
EmailTemplate.subject: BlueWave Community - More Information Needed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear,
Thank you for submitting your application to BlueWave Community. We are excited to work with you to build a cleaner tomorrow!
You will receive notice on your application status within the next two business days. Upon application approval, we will assign you to a Community Solar project and send you your enrollment contract.
In the meantime, if you have any questions, please contact us at bluewavesolar@bluewavesolar.com.
Sincerely,
BlueWave Customer Care
